content: स्तंभ् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {c5c} {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> (स्तंभते, स्तभ्नोति, स्तभ्नाति, स्तांभित or स्तब्धः; the स् of the root being changed to ष् after prepositions ending in इ or उ and also after अव) {@--1@} To stop, hinder, arrest, suppress; कंठः स्तंभितबाष्पवृत्तिकलुषः <ls>Ś. 4. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To make firm or stiff, to make immoveable. {@--3@} To stupefy, paralyze, benumb; प्राणा दध्वंसिरे गात्रं तस्तंभे च हते प्रिये <ls>Bk. 14. 55.</ls> {@--4@} To prop, support, uphold, sustain. {@--5@} To become stiff, rigid or immoveable. {@--6@} To be proud or elated, be stiff-necked. (The following verse illustrates the root in its different conjugations: --स्तंभते पुरुषः प्रायो यौवनेन धनने च . न स्तभ्नाति क्षितीशोऽपि न स्तभ्नोति युवाप्यसौ ..). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (स्तंभयति-ते) {@--1@} To stop, arrest. {@--2@} To make firm or rigid. {@--3@} To paralyze. {@--4@} To prop, support.
